Porsche increases 2023 deliveries despite China slumpLuxury carmaker Porsche increased its deliveries by 3% in 2023, with 320,221 vehicles delivered worldwide, as growth in Europe and North America offset a challenging market in China, the company said on Friday. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 08:03:15 GMT EHGNPJEBVNMV7L4I62RJV5FZPY https://www.reuters.com/business/auto-transportation/porsche-increases-2023-deliveries-despite-china-slump-2024-01-12/Reuters商业汽车与交通
China media warns against taking China's Indian Ocean research as threatsChinese state media warned on Friday that a report by a prominent U.S. think tank on the military uses of Chinese scientific research across the Indian Ocean gave "ammunition" to countries bent on concocting threats from China. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 07:51:19 GMT AOQP3UMTK5JW5DGBLJNI3RVP3E https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/china-media-warns-against-china-take-indian-ocean-research-threats-2024-01-12/Greg Torode世界亚太地区
China-Russia 2023 trade value hits record high of $240 bln - Chinese customsChina's 2023 two-way trade with Russia hit $240 billion, setting yet another new record, Chinese customs data showed on Friday, as the two countries pushed for closer economic ties even as the war in Ukraine raged on. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 07:49:52 GMT 7CSHDLZYIRJMHOLUTEBHLGTOM https://www.reuters.com/markets/china-Russia-2023-trade-value-hits-record-high-240-bln-chinese-customs-2024-01-12/Reuters市场
China lifts five-year ban on Belgium pig, pork products over African swine feverChina's customs on Friday lifted a five-year ban on pig and pork products from Belgium that was implemented because of an outbreak of African swine fever in 2018. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 07:46:51 GMT KK6AU45UPZPTNEBMSQ5VR5E2CU https://www.reuters.com/markets/commodities/china-lifts- Five-year-ban-belgium-pig-pork-products-due-african-swine-fever-2024-01-12/Mei Mei Chu市场商品
Taiwan parties to make final push for support in critical electionTaiwan's three main political parties will hold mass rallies on Friday evening in a final push for support ahead of critical presidential and parliamentary elections happening against a backdrop of increased Chinese pressure on the island. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 06:54:27 GMT 4NMV3GRDHZIX5FIGLEWZ7I7KWM https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/taiwan-parties-make-final-push-support-ritic-election-2024-01-12/Zahra Matarani, Joseph Campbell世界亚太地区
Early days yet but 'light and happy' Raducanu sees path back to the topEmma Raducanu cautions that her comeback is in its early stages heading into the Australian Open but feels she has finally shed some of the mental baggage of her fairytale Grand Slam triumph at Flushing Meadows. Fri, 12 Jan 2024 06:53:58 GMT 6WC3PHPNQ5I27MHP3P7TWARUWM https://www.reuters.com/sports/tennis/early-days-yet-light-happy-raducanu-sees-path-back-top-2024-01-12/Reuters运动的网球
